categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Cynerus was a male Sith Lord who was one of the Sith Empire's top assassins during the Galactic War, with forty-nine confirmed kills of Republic officials. Keenly intelligent and physically impressive, Cynerus was committed to developing new ways to kill, and was tasked with the assassination of the Senator of the planet Ord Mantell.
